title: 111_s3141
content: Low Income Housing Tax Credit Recovery Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the low-income housing tax credit, to allow: (1) a five-year carryback period for unused tax credit amounts. (2) an extended carryback period for new investments in housing in 2010 and 2011. And (3) a full offset of such credit against regular income tax liability.
